title: Teen slain in Pine Lawn shooting identified - KMOV.com
content:
PINE LAWN (KMOV.com) -
The Major Case Squad is investigating after a teenager was fatally shot in Pine Lawn Monday evening.
The 15-year-old Pine Lawn resident, later identified as Jirah Campbell, was found with the fatal wound inside an alley in the 6300 block of Dardanella just after 5 p.m.
Investigators told News 4 they have some strong leads.
Tuesday morning, police released two photos of an orange vehicle believed to belong to the suspect. They said when the driver of the vehicle was a woman with braids, but the shooting suspect is a man in his late teens or early 20’s.
Anyone with information should contact Det. Doug Barber at 314-574-4041 or CrimeStoppers at 314-725-8477.
